titles.title: 583 I Worship Thee Sweet Will of God (familiar - e

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I worship Thee
Sweet will of God
And all Thy ways adore
And every day
I live I long
To love Thee
More and more

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
And He hath breathed
Into my soul
A special love of Thee
A love to lose
My will in His
And by that loss be free

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
I love to kiss each print
Where Thou hast sent
Thine unseen feet
I cannot fear Thee
Blessed Will
Thine empire
Is so sweet

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
I have no cares
O blessed Will
For all my cares
Are Thine
I live in triumph
Lord for thou
Hast made Thy tiumphs mine

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
All that He blesses
Is our good
And unblessed good
Is ill
And all is right
That seems most wrong
If it be His sweet will
